name: CaribbeanPraiseRadio
0:
”Alexa, open Caribbean praise radio”
”Alexa, play Caribbean praise radio”
”Alexa, start Caribbean praise radio”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: caribbean praise radio
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Caribbean Praise Radio & WebTV was a vision long in the making, with a desire to take the gospel around the world, Pastor Gilbert failed at many attempts. Then came live streaming, a God sent, a savior. Having to learn this new technology, Pastor Gilbert satrted with his phone, then came Sermon.net and then vmix.

It cost, but willing, Pastor Gilbert put his own resources into the vision. With partners like Sermon.net, Tom Sinclair of Eastern shore Broadcasting https://easternshorebroadcasting.com/ the vision became a reality. Still learning this world of streaming Pastor Gilbert has made it his passion always looking for new streaming ideas. (CPR &WEBTV) Caribbean Christian Broadcasting is that new idea, a place to stream uninterrupted. The goal of CPR &WEBTV is to allow ministries to stream through it’s platform.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
